cmp: 宿 (lodge for the night/old/former, (a) night, constellation)
佰 ((complicated form of) hundred (used to avoid fraud))
mng: to withdraw, to pull back, to contract, to shrink, to reduce, abbreviation, also pr. [su4]

exm.mng: miniature version of sth, microcosm, epitome, (Tw) to microfilm
to lengthen and shorten, flexible, adjustable, retractable, extensible, telescoping (collapsible)
to reduce, to decrease, to shrink
to wither, to dry up (of a plant), to atrophy (of muscle, social custom etc)
to concentrate (a liquid), concentration, espresso coffee, abbr. for 意式濃縮咖啡|意式浓缩咖啡
